Logic Analysis: Contains the main application logic, initializes Flask app and routes.
Defines TicketModel and Comment classes for ORM with SQLAlchemy.
Handles HTTP requests and responses, interacts with models to perform CRUD operations.
Contains AnalyticsService class that provides methods for analytics microservices.
Shared Knowledge: All database operations are handled through SQLAlchemy ORM, and the SQLite backend is used for development purposes. Analytics microservices communicate via RESTful APIs.
